snippet.title: Blade Buster (NES/Famicom Homebrew Shoot 'Em Up)
snippet.description:
Game Title: Blade Buster
Platform/Console: Nintendo Entertainment System/NES
Emulator: Nestopia
Category: Homebrew

After discovering this instant classic over this past weekend, I played it nonstop and seriously can't get enough of it! It wasn't my best run, but I just had to record and make a video of this awesome homebrew game! Could have racked up a lot more points, for instance, by remaining in the center and blasting that one thingymabobber before it could form, but with the possibility of backfire, I decided to avoid the intense heat and just get barraged with mucus instead. If you haven't played this game or didn't know of its existence until now, I highly recommend it and encourage you to try it out for yourself! Make a video of your personal experience(s) with this game and post it as a video response!

Download Blade Buster from the following site/link!
http://hlc6502.web.fc2.com/Bbuster.htm
